test_questions.summarytext_all_correct: You did it! You chose all of the correct answers. Keep up the great work.
test_questions.summarytext:
You completed the exercise.

Now you can go back and review or continue by navigating to the next screen.
test_questions.instructions: Read each item carefully, and select the best response.

question.scenario: A patient with disconjugate gaze following an ocular injury:
question.a: most likely has a concomitant basilar skull fracture.
should have ice applied to the eyes to prevent blindness.
has a discoordination between the movements of both eyes.
should be treated by irrigating both eyes for 20 minutes.
